original_text: And laid it in his own new tomb, which he had hewn out in the rock: and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre, and departed.
korean_text: 바위 속에 판 자기 새 무덤에 넣어 두고 큰 돌을 굴려 무덤 문에 놓고 가니

sentences.original_text: And laid it in his own new tomb
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 그의 새 무덤에 두니

sentences.original_text: which he had hewn out in the rock
and he rolled a great stone
to the door of the sepulchre
